product.title: Conair Instant Heat Styling Brush, 0.75 Inch
product.description:
Conair Instant Heat Styling Brush, 0.75 Inch

Brand : conair

Manufacturer : Conair



- Hair Type: All

- Color: Hot Black Silver

- Brand: Conair

- Material: Alloy Steel

- Item Dimensions LxWxH: 6 x 3.3 x 15 inches

- 25 heat settings for all types of hair with auto-off; 30-second fast heat up time

- Turbo Heat button provides burst of heat for faster styling

- Smart Technology provides consistent heat for lasting style

- Multi-layer technology, barrel combines the elements of chromium, nickel, copper and steel

- Dual voltage for international travel




The Conair Instant Heat Hot Brush features a 3/4-inch barrel for gorgeous, long-lasting curls. Smart technology keeps the barrel at a stabilized heat during styling to apply even heat while styling and avoid damaging hot spots. It features a 30-second heat up and 25 temperature settings for all hair types. 

BRAND STORY
By Conair 

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Features:

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
